text:
from
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION
OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
1346 Connecticut Ave., N. W., Washington 6, D. C.
November 2, 1962
Dear Dr. Spaulding:
Enclosed is the manuscript which Mr. Hill
discussed with you this morning. He failed
to mention that this is Mr. McLuhan's only
copy and therefore, Mr. Hill would like this
back when you are through with it.
Sincerely,
Mary Iynn Moody
Secretary to Harold Hill
